document.full_text: israel asked the united nations on friday to help prevent activists sailing to gaza on the first anniversary of the bloody israeli seizure of a turkish ship that tried to reach the blockaded palestinian enclave.
document.title: israel asks u.n. to help block planned gaza flotilla
lines_and_colors: israel asked the united nations on friday to help prevent activists sailing to gaza on the first anniversary of the bloody israeli seizure of a turkish ship that tried to reach the blockaded palestinian enclave.
